website_summaries.verdict: A classy Nixon watch that is both contemporary and simplistic with a few minor quirks that don't detract from its quality and value.
pros: Attracts compliments for its sleek, black finish and modern design that goes with almost any outfit or occasion
The construction has a substantial, well-made feel
Falls on the middle range of the brand's price spectrum
cons: Men with thin wrists may find the large dial a bit overwhelming
A few owners gripe about the watch arriving in dusty, subpar packaging

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous watch
customer_reviews.text: my bf had been wanting the ss corporal for a while now but its 2 bills through Nixon. When i found it on amazon i immediately bought it. the watch itself came in perfect condition. the amazon packaging could have been better, it had wiggle room inside the box. still, nothing was broken. the face is hard to see at night and the arms need to be exposed to light in order to glow, normal day exposure wont light them up enough to see at night. its still a fantastic watch, i ordered him a large and he had 1 1/2 links removed. fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking watch in matte black
customer_reviews.text: Good looking watch. Edgy & different. I don't like how heavy it is or how difficult it is to see the numbers on it but I'm getting is as a gift for a highschooler--he may not care about these things. Just wish the dial lit up... And the box it comes in isn't great (at all). Had contemplated returning it & getting something different but haven't found anything I like better so I'll probably stick with it. Overall cool watch though and seems to be well made. Chose it for the price point, quality, overall aesthetic and like the matte black.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Needham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch on a Prime deal of the day and couldn't be happier. It's a very solid watch. If ya have smaller or skinny arms avoid this watch. It is a bit heavy but normally that translates to well made. The watch is comfortable and I wear it alot. Very classy modern watch. I would highly recommend this watch and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: nickm

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT light up in the dark but otherwise I LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: It's very elegant yet unique and easy to read in the daytime. Love that it is sturdy and truly waterproof. I had to buy a kit for $7 to add the extra link that was provided because I like my watches loose but that was cheap and easy enough since they sent the link with the watch. If only the dial had some way to be seen in the dark or even near dark it would be 6 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dana J. Habeck

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome, I didn't use to wear a watch but saw this one and bought it and now I'm wearing it almost every day. Really like the black color but the downside is that it can get scratched really easy. So fat mine doesn't have any scratches but read that Nixon offers repairs if needed. Only thing to consider is the size, I'm tall so it doesn't look weird but if you're tall or like watches that are somewhat big go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Sánchez

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely nothing wrong with this watch
customer_reviews.text: Watch came well packaged and is authentic. Looks very stylish and fits my smaller than average wrist after removal of some links. The glass face of the watch comes with a clear film to protect the glass from scratches and smudges. The film itself is smudge-proof. This is a very nice and stylish Nixon watch (at least for me as a college student). I get compliments on this watch at least once of every two days!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: This watch has a great feel and size to it and you can't beat it for the price. I already knew about being careful with the black scratching on the band or casing, so I'm careful with it and haven't had any scratches in it yet. The only thing that is a little annoying is that if you are in a dim lit room or area outside at night, it can be a little difficult to read the time since the numbers and hands are so dark, but the hands are glow in the dark if you let it set in the light long enough. Even with this though, the watch looks sharp and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my fiancé
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé had been wanting a watch (never a watch wearer) and I looked for weeks to find him a good one for his birthday. This watch is perfect and it looks excellent on him! I read in other reviews that the color was chipping off, he's worn his to work (he's a bartender) and so far no chipping. He's really happy with his gift.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Black on Black Nixon
customer_reviews.text: The watch feels great on the wrist and definitely grabs attention. My gripe with it is that there is no way to see the time in the dark because it is black on black, so try to use it only during the day or a well lit event.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and large watch
customer_reviews.text: 1-Formely, I never had a black metal watch , only small plastic ; never seen this before and was a bit unsatisfied . 2-To me , the more weighs a watch, the more idurable it is and value it has .
customer_reviews.author: sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally Hefty. Well Made. Nice Watch.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch. Feels like it would withstand the blast of nuclear bomb. Extremely well made and just what I was looking for. The dials were supposed to be luminous for viewing in low light, but mine never did. and for that reason I gave it 4 stars. Other than that, (again) very well made and it feels exceptionally sound . . . bgs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob GlickSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch, very simple.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch, very simple. It doesnt have any extra functions, other than give time, but it looks great. Do keep in mind that this is way more shinny than what is shown in the picture. I got the gun metal color + black dial (green numbers) and the metal is very polished, very shinny. So this would be a good watch for elegant or business casual clothing. In my opinion it is too shiny for casual clothing. Looks amazing nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: EL KEVO

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect all black watch.
customer_reviews.text: Just what you want in an all black watch. Looks great, feels great, link system is perfect and they give you extra links if needed. More about looks than function since the face is all black too.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks awesome! I have had more compliments on this watch than any that I’ve ever owned! I would buy again and again! Great price and it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my boyfriend at Christmas. He liked it the minute he took it out of the box and wears it all the time. I also find it to be a very attractive piece.
customer_reviews.author: Caseyjo

customer_reviews.title: Link will not come out.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, very durable, nice looking, but I gave it 4 reviews because it’s impossible to take a link out, I tried everything and it won’t come out.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Oborny

customer_reviews.title: Watch did not work!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the watch it was not working! I thought the battery may be dead! So instead of returning it I took it to a jewelry store. They replaced the battery and it is currently working! However, I would have thought they would not ship a watch that was not working!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Bummer!
customer_reviews.text: Really durable and the brand has always been tried and true but this watch in particular is not worth it. You literally can not see the numbers or hands on top of the black face. There is no difference in the colors at all. Super difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Great authentic Nixon! Flashy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriends birthday, nicely packaged. Nice big face and brushed gold look. Note: If you are a bigger person with large wrists, it comes with 3 extra band links in the box-we had to purchase 2 more to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Whorchata

customer_reviews.title: Quality Watch so far
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a big faced watch for quite a while, and the Corporal SS is the perfect fit for me. The band will need to be professionally resized unless you have the tools to remove the pins at home, but it is fairly cheap to have it resized. The watch is fairly heavy due to it's size, but I actually like that in a watch, but that is something to keep in mind. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: This has lasted me many years. I was surprised to discover the numbers and clock arms were glow in the dark
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch.. it is a very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch😍 when I saw it. It was a must have. I am very much satisfied with my order
customer_reviews.author: Cconey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love Nixon style watches like these. Very happy so far and hope it doesn’t croak like my last Nixon. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Polished Gunmetal is very dark and glossy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Nixon Corporal for my son. It's a nice watch however the polished gunmetal is a closer to a glossy black. Fortunately, my son liked the color so he kept the watch. Had I purchased it for myself, I’d have returned it due to the misrepresented color depicted in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: 3sheetsgone

customer_reviews.title: NIXON IS CLASS
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th Nixon watch, I like to change out which watch I wear to shake things up. Nixon never disappoints with quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Yeah buddy

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Valentine’s Day and he LOVED IT! The only issue he has is he has to take links out and that is always a pain. I’m glad I decided to look on here instead of buying from the actual website. There is was going to be $199.95.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne E Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved this gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for valentines day, he was shocked, and so happy to get this. He thought I paid WAYYYY more than I did. It is great quality and was in perfect condition! Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Just as shown in picture love the color better looking in person
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love Nixon
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. He loves Nixon watches and this is his favorite so far. We may or may not have a collection of them :)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite watch I own
customer_reviews.text: Favorite watch I own. Worth every penny. Get a lot of compliments. Many people note the size as well. I'm about 5'10 165 and this watch isn't TOO huge. Much smaller than the 51-30, in my opinion that thing looks ridiculously huge even on big dudes. Really like this Nixon!
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I get constant compliments on this watch. It’s hard to read at night but always looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P. Jungers

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Definitely an attention getter!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and great quality. You'll get people's attention with time piece. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B-Rock

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he has a big wrist and looks great. Fits perfect, love the color and easy to read time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The watch came wrapped like s****!
customer_reviews.text: The white Nixon watch box looked super dirty and tapped with dirty clear tape all ghetto. This was suppose to be given as a gift. Looks like I bought it used or bought it banged up from Last Chance. This is embarrassing to give as a nice gift! WTH
customer_reviews.author: VanessaM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfortable and sporty looking. Love this watch...and I did not have to remove any links.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus T.

customer_reviews.title: Styling
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black watch and it is fantastic looking. Large and heavy, feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: Compliments. Compliments everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years, I still get compliments about my watch (Gold- tone) wherever I go. I've only had to change batteries last summer (2018).
customer_reviews.author: Christian Mai

customer_reviews.title: The watch is perfect but the black background in my dark copper watch ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is perfect but the black background in my dark copper watch was really messed up it looked like the forgot to paint part of it. I mean i bought it on sale for $100. I would return it but due to it being a gift i dont have time to return it and wait or another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Up to Par
customer_reviews.text: It's like store bought. Comes in perfect condition. Identical to the one I bought at the mall. No complaints. Highly recommend for anyone who's a Nixon corporal fan.
customer_reviews.author: david Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and very stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with mine. I'm wearing it every few days and the steel finish doesn't seem to scratch easily. The fit isn't perfect, it's either too tight or too loose for my taste, but I have a strange size rist. Note that you'll need tools to make link adjustments. You can do it with things around your home but its very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Voltty

customer_reviews.title: GANGSTA
customer_reviews.text: Love it, looks great and for a cheaper price then the stores
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: my son Loved it, got it for him for Freshman year ...
customer_reviews.text: my son Loved it , got it for him for Freshman year of HS
customer_reviews.author: sonny

customer_reviews.title: Finish marks and stains easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the gunmetal finish and while it's a nice watch, I spend more time trying to clean it than anything else. Don't wear this if you use lotion or anything else on your skin or it will be marked up constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Xxhurley82xx

customer_reviews.title: Battery was dead upon delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is exactly what I expected. I have multiple watches from Nixon. When the watch was delivered to me, the battery was dead. I had to take it to a jewelry store to get a new battery replaced on a brand new $200 watch.
customer_reviews.author: J A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality watch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect watch , based on the reviews I thought it would of been to big but the watch looks great
customer_reviews.author: Patrica B Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! The face is not too big nor too thick for my wrist. I like the color and the gloss of the polished gunmetal band. A few of my friends have already noticed it and gave good comments about it. This watch is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: Husband smacked it on the corner of a metal sink at work, not even a scratch or chip in the glass. Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.author: Gangas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The Gold is pealing off the watch already would recommend anyone to buy a Nixon from here
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and he loves it! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R

customer_reviews.title: Good price, nice weight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for older brothers birthday, he likes it. Good price, nice weight, and the gunmetal and orange are neat.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy V

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Watch was the quality expected. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Watch came and everything looked good but after setting the time it never did work. I’ve returned it and they show I’ve received my refund but it has never shown up on my statement. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Janeene Price

customer_reviews.title: Quality Nixon watch for an amazing price!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this watch in today, it was packaged well and I am extremely happy with it! Extra links included, flawless finish, started right up and looks fantastic! Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alaun

customer_reviews.title: Greatness
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend, loved it! It showed up on time in perfect condition! Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tazia Ward

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as an anniversary gift. Not only did it arrive promptly, but very nicely packaged. My husband was very happy with it. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: gloriav

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and has a big face
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Nixon watch purchase because my boyfriend loves them so much! Very sturdy and has a big face, which he loves. The gunmetal color is a deep gray, and not as silver as it is in the picture, but I'm happy it's darker! The green/glow in the dark hands really stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Nixon watches!
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loved the watch, ours a little bigger than I tight, but still very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to pay for maintaining
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch but after 6 months the band fell apart and i had to pay 70.00 to get it fixed because of no warranty
customer_reviews.author: Cameo

customer_reviews.title: Best watch I've purchased yet
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money and the wait.. amazing quality heavy always get compliments not to big just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the edge of the watch face
customer_reviews.text: Is not what I expected, I don't like the edge of the watch face.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch was everything I was looking for!! it has a heavy feel, a rich gold color and stands out. Its something you can wear in a casual or business setting!!!
customer_reviews.author: G$moove

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it. Please keep in mind that the dial is huge and fits well in big wrists. I love the green dial and big digits. The delivery of consignment was extremely fast - got the order within one week from U.S to KSA.
customer_reviews.author: Fasih Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch. Solid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch. Solid, sturdy, very masculine. While I have several good quality watches, this is rapidly becoming a favorite. Only caveat is that it's a large, heavy watch. If that's OK for you, then highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Valium Surfer

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice watch and I get compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. It's a nice watch and I get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zetrouer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea for Men
customer_reviews.text: Perfect watch for Men's Gift! Classy, durable, looks expensive even though it's not. The person I gifted it for mentioned he loved it because he could dress it up or dress is down.
customer_reviews.author: Mair

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome watch. Purchased his for my 18 year old newphew and he loved it! my father who is in his late 50s could not read the time on this though it being black on black but it's perfect and great looking for men with no vision problems
customer_reviews.author: Stace

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied customer 👏👏👏
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. This watch was exactly what was promised beautiful . and half the price. I will definitely be telling all of my friends and ordering more.. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Rone

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: After 5-6 times in the ocean this watch took on water & stopped working.. piece of junk & could possibly be counterfeit!! Stay away from this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice looking, substantial, easy to see. Very satisfied. Color is a tad copperish. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BobfromCT

customer_reviews.title: it was brand new and I love it. Do not buy your watch at Watchismo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch brand new from Amazon, it was brand new and I love it. Do not buy your watch at Watchismo, I bought a watch there and it was used, they would not take it back, they suck.
customer_reviews.author: Snarfle Barbin

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. I'm a chick who digs big watches. I'm also old'ish and can't see like a used to. I can see the time on this watch without squinting. The only drawback is that it is a tad heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thackeray

customer_reviews.title: Really nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my husband for Christmas and it actually look very nice it's not to shiny it's medium size it's not that big it fits my husband wrist perfectly he did have to take one link out but that was super easy for him to do. He was a very happy man when he seen this gift
customer_reviews.author: pamii

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas but I ended up giving it to him early an he lovesss it. It fits perfectly, the only time he takes it off is when he’s going to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Laysiia

customer_reviews.title: The seller service and delivery was great, The actual watch color scheme didnt work out ...
customer_reviews.text: The seller service and delivery was great, The actual watch color scheme didnt work out for me. I recommend other colors but black/gold
customer_reviews.author: Giselle Diaz

customer_reviews.title: My Nixon Gets More Attention Than An 8k Rolex!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of my favorite watches! Came in a day early and attracts so much attention, not to big or small just the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: rafael

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery crapped out in two weeks. Have to send back to Nixon for repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Outer Banx

customer_reviews.title: Flawed glass/crystal. Had to return!
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to the watch itself. It had a flawed glass/crystal so I had to send it back. I talked to another friend who had the same problem with the "smokey" glass. Must be a bad batch
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Summa

customer_reviews.title: This watch is so nice! Received lots of compliments first day I wore ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so nice! Received lots of compliments first day I wore it! Definitely a hell of a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie P.

customer_reviews.title: Manly Gift
customer_reviews.text: Is an elegant watch that fits perfectly. Is sturdy and a perfect accessory to wear with a lot of outfits. Perfect gift for a man.
customer_reviews.author: joseph arrezola

customer_reviews.title: awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my boyfriend and he loves it. It's a very nice watch, it has a large face on it so it's very noticeable and the numbers and ticks on it are large so it's easy to tell time on it. The watch hands also glow in the dark so I think that's a pretty nifty feature.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch for my boyfriend, he wears it practically everyday. He loves it! Got the "Polished Gunmetal" color and it's a bit darker than in the picture, but it looks good
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D

customer_reviews.title: Dope Watch
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Big, but not "ghetto - middle of the mall jewelry store" big
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kalaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY VERY HAPPY! SUCH AN AWESOME WATCH, FITS GREAT. SHIPPED VERY QUICK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real deal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and amazing quality! Exact same one we seen for much more at the mall!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Not too heavy of a watch compared ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear this just about every day! Love it! Not too heavy of a watch compared to a 51-30. Most people think of it as a large watch, but I feel that it's just the right size! Plan to buy in a different color as well!
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sold me broken watch
customer_reviews.text: Sold it to me with a dead battery. I switched them out and turns out the watch was completely broke. Never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great solid watch!
customer_reviews.text: I've received many compliments on this watch. It's very solid and a little heavy at first. I wear it everywhere (e.g. work, outdoors) and only have a couple of minute scratches. The watch holds up very well. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: 0xDEC0DE

customer_reviews.title: nice design just not practical for me as it's sharp
customer_reviews.text: nice design just not practical for me as it's sharp, heavy, oversized and doesn't really seem to have luminescent hands but I don't think I got past the weight and sharp edges of lugs/bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Design

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend and he loved it. It's his "go to" watch when he wants to be fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch! More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: First time I buy a watch on Amazon and I love it. Feels like a well made watch.
customer_reviews.author: Rivero, Albert

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great, it has a big face which works great for me since im a bigger man. Its flashy but yet very appropriate for any situation and it was delivered to me right on time .
customer_reviews.author: keondre'

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch got lots of compliments no complaints here
customer_reviews.author: Tmoney Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Bought it for my boyfriend for his birthday and he loved it. It's a great color combo and very nice and sturdy. Definitely would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. I get tons of compliments on thus. Picture does not do it justice. Dressier than it looks
customer_reviews.author: rr

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy here at Amazon  again
customer_reviews.text: I love Nixon watches Amazon has such a great selection of them for a great deal too thanx Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyden

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but wasn’t working
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of it not working, hope it’s just the battery needing to be replaced
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brown

customer_reviews.title: Attention-getter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch with a gunmetal band and matching gunmetal face for my boyfriend's birthday. It has a very big face and the watch has some weight to it. He said it was his favorite gift ever, even though he had take the time to take it to a jeweler to add a link It was packaged perfectly and came in mint condition, no scratches. I will definitely buy him another Nixon at these great prices!
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Moose

customer_reviews.title: nicely packaged. Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my fiancé and he loves it. No scratches, nicely packaged. Arrived on time. Very nice watch. Most likely I will buy another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaelenaa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I loved this watch so much and decided to purchase it for my boyfriend. It arrived on time and was beautiful right out of the box. The face is a bit over sized but it is a cool look. Unfortunately it was a bit too big for my boyfriend's wrist so I am returning it, but over all this was a great product and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: neeners

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great, fits snug. So it won't feel lose on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Montano

product_meta.title: Nixon Corporal SS A346. 100m Water Resistant XL Men’s Watch (48mm Watch Face. 24mm Stainless Steel Band)
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No

feature_bullets: NIXON CORPORAL SS (ALL BLACK). This stainless steel Nixon watch has a 3-hand movement with large numeral indices and a printer seconds track. The burly construction is fit for durability and comfort.

MODERN DESIGN. Both functional and rugged, the Corporal is made with a stainless steel band, stainless enamel case and a no-fuss, modern design, with a signature Lum Dial for nighttime viewing.The dial includes military inspired bold printed indices and numbers, a printed seconds track and custom molded hands with luminous fill

FUELED BY ADVENTURES. We deliver products that meet your needs in various high-stress work and play environments, whether it’s across the globe or down the street. Stainless steel screw down caseback and spring pin lugs
FOR A LIFE WELL LIVED. Through our dedicated teams perspectives, we contribute to a single unified expression: team-designed, custom-built accessories.
A DISPLAY OF SUPERIOR STYLE. A strategic blend of high-caliber construction and disciplined design results in a watch that is water resistant 100m with a 48 mm case and fierce stainless steel design
